p: Despite the change cited before, the percentage of cumulative emissions allocated to Annex I Mediterranean countries by the MCJ (45%) might seem high, taking into account that in the future, it is expected that they will host only 40% of the region’s population. This is due to the specific situation of Turkey among the Annex I countries, which will be discussed throughout this paper. When Turkey is excluded from the Annex I country group or, in other words, when Mediterranean countries that are part of the EU27 and those that are not are analyzed separately, a vision complementary to the previous one is obtained.
